articles.author: Sammy Westfall
articles.title: What to know about the deadly Nipah virus, amid outbreak in India - The Washington Post
articles.description: Some airports in Asia are on alert after confirmed cases in West Bengal of the  Nipah virus, which has no cure. South Asia sees outbreaks nearly every year.
articles.content:
Airports in Southeast Asia are on alert this week after the confirmation of an outbreak of Nipah virus, which has no cure, in West Bengal, India.
Thailand implemented health screening checkpoints fo… [+160 chars]
